Package com.tradingCardInventory.controllers

Class DeckController

java.lang.Object
com.tradingCardInventory.controllers.DeckController
public class DeckController extends Object
The DeckController class manages user interactions related to decks in the trading card inventory system. Acting as the controller in the MVC pattern, it facilitates operations such as creating, deleting, viewing, modifying, and selling decks through the ManageDeck model manager and updates the corresponding GUI components via MainView.

This class also collaborates with CollectionController to fetch available cards from the user's collection.

    • DeckController

      public DeckController(ManageDeck manageDeck, MainView mainView, MenuController menuController, CollectionController collectionController)
      Constructs a DeckController that manages interactions between the deck view, main application view, and relevant controllers.
      Parameters:
      manageDeck - the panel or view responsible for managing decks
      mainView - the main application window or frame
      menuController - the controller responsible for menu navigation and actions
      collectionController - the controller that manages the user's card collection

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Initializes the deck management view by populating the left-side navigation panel and setting the default center panel.

    • createDeck

      public boolean createDeck(String deckName, DeckType deckType)
      Attempts to create a new deck with the specified name and type.
      Parameters:
      deckName - the desired name of the deck
      deckType - the type of the deck (must match DeckType)
      Returns:
      true if the deck was created successfully, false if it already exists

    • deleteDeck

      public boolean deleteDeck(String deckName)
      Attempts to delete a deck by its name.
      Parameters:
      deckName - the name of the deck to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • addCardToDeck

      public boolean addCardToDeck(String deckName, String cardName)
      Adds a card from the collection to the specified deck.
      Parameters:
      deckName - the target deck name
      cardName - the name of the card to add
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise

    • removeCardFromDeck

      public boolean removeCardFromDeck(String deckName, String cardName)
      Removes a card from the specified deck.
      Parameters:
      deckName - the deck to remove the card from
      cardName - the card to remove
      Returns:
      true if removal succeeded, false otherwise

    • getAllDeckNames

      Returns:
      a list of deck names

    • getAllSellableDeckNames

      public List<String> getAllSellableDeckNames()
      Retrieves the names of decks that are instances of DeckSellable.
      Returns:
      a list of sellable deck names

    • getAllDeckCardNames

      public List<String> getAllDeckCardNames(String deckName)
      Retrieves the names of all cards within a specific deck.
      Parameters:
      deckName - the name of the deck
      Returns:
      a list of card names, or null if the deck doesn't exist

    • getCollectionCardNames

      public List<String> getCollectionCardNames()
      Retrieves names of cards from the user's collection that have a count > 0.
      Returns:
      a list of available card names

    • getCards

      Retrieves the list of Card objects within a given deck.
      Parameters:
      deckName - the name of the deck
      Returns:
      a list of Card instances in the deck

      public boolean sellDeck(String deckName)
      Attempts to sell the specified deck.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
